text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #QA #fulltime #QA #Regular #remote #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #LUXOFT #Manual #senior
#Systems #Analyst
–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ #–†–æ—Å—Å–∏—è
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å:  #fulltime 
üí∞–ó–ø: –æ—Ç 200000 RUB Gross
ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚Äç–ü–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è: QA Systems Analyst
üéØ–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Luxoft

üßø–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞
The QA Systems Analyst professional will be responsible for preparing UAT environments for system integration testing and user acceptance. This position requires the ability to follow, design, and execute test environment setup plans and procedures during System Integration Testing of applications. It also requires executing and troubleshooting batch jobs. Provide sound root cause analysis and remediation for failures. This position requires good QA skillset with the technical ability to manage test environments and troubleshooting skills.

üßø–û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
‚Ä¢ Help manage UAT test environment and UAT test data ensuring support of test efforts and schedules.
‚Ä¢ Proactively manage the UAT phase, take ownership of the UAT cycle, drive efficient and timely execution and issue resolution.
‚Ä¢ Lead and facilitate UAT processes with a passion for delivering a great user experience.
‚Ä¢ Assess severity, gather impacts, engage necessary support teams, and escalate appropriately to ensure timely resolution of issues.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with other team members, support team, and software developers to deliver the high-quality applications in a timely manner.
‚Ä¢ Look for improvement opportunities in monitoring, application stability, and root cause analysis
‚Ä¢ Create and execute test scripts, cases, and scenarios that will determine optimal system performance according to specifications.
‚Ä¢ Analyze formal test results in order to discover and resolve defects, bugs, errors, configuration issues, and interoperability flaws.
‚Ä¢ Analyze documentation and technical specifications of any new application under deployment or consideration to determine its intended functionality.
‚Ä¢ Produce reports and documentation for all testing efforts, results, activities, data, logging, and tracking.
‚Ä¢ Communicate test progress, test results, and other relevant information

üßø–ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏—è
1. 3+ years testing and test coordination experience.
2. Financial and Capital market domain experience.
3. Strong MSSQL Database knowledge and CRUD concept (PL/SQL, MSQL and tools knowledge is a must).
4. Experience with .Net \ Java applications - working with logs, troubleshooting, debugging.
5. Linux environment experience with good shell scripting knowledge.
6. Familiarity with Job Schedulers. (Autosys, Active Batch)
7. The candidate should have good scripting skills to script out basic environment management tasks and monitoring.
8. Good organizational skills, ability to manage varied workloads efficiently
9. Must be a self-starter who is comfortable working in a very dynamic environment, with rapidly changing priorities.
10. Proactively manage the UAT phase, take ownership of the UAT cycle, drive efficient and timely execution and issue resolution.
11. Help with the integration testing of applications.
12. Good communication skills.

üßø–ë—ã–ª–æ –±—ã +
1. Experience in IT support
2. Experience in OPS
3. Experience in release management
üì©–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã:  –ï–∫–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–Ω–∞                                                                                           —Ç–≥ @shust_ka

text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è 
#remote 

–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è:  Captiv8 https://captiv8.io/
–¢—Ä–µ–±—É–µ–º—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –æ—Ç 2—Ö –ª–µ—Ç (–Ω–∞ –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö)
–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è: –ó–ü –¥–æ 5000 usd
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ  (GMT +3)
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞: –ò–ü (–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –≤–∞—à–∏ –Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏ + —Å–æ—Ü. –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç)

‚óªÔ∏è Data Engineer ‚óªÔ∏è
Join our team of world-class data scientists and data engineers, and challenge yourself with some of the most pressing data science and engineering tasks of modern times!

About Us:
Captiv8 brings unrivaled audience insights and accountability to the influencer space, along with
thoughtful creative storytelling to power the most effective and memorable social content.
Captiv8 is an AI-powered global influencer platform connecting and delivering influencers,
audiences, and brands at scale: We work with top Fortune brands like Verizon, Nestle, Ford,
Amazon, Kraft Heinz, and many others. Captiv8‚Äôs platform features passionate influencers
across Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Snapchat, YouTube, and other social channels
with extensive global audience reach. We offer a full stack of data-driven products and services,
bringing to life powerful content that is targeted, effective, and memorable. We have spent the
last five years streamlining branded content creation and measurement, working with ad
agencies, PR agencies, brands, and talent agencies.
Their founding team is made up of proven industry leaders that have over $1B in acquisitions,
managed over $600M+ in revenue, and taken two companies public. Their latest venture was
one of the largest monetization platforms on the planet for the mobile-first economy.
Captiv8 is backed by credible institutions, including Social+Capital, Subtraction Capital, Launch
Fund, and many others.

Technical background: 
‚ñ´Ô∏è2+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or Backend Engineer 
‚ñ´Ô∏èGood understanding of SQL and NoSQL databases, design, and methods for efficiently retrieving data 
‚ñ´Ô∏èStrong knowledge of one the programming language: Java/Scala or Python 
‚ñ´Ô∏èUnderstanding of Big Data technologies and solutions (Hadoop, Spark, etc) 
‚ñ´Ô∏èExperience with streaming services(Kafka, Kinesis) and public clouds infrastructure (AWS preferred) is a big plus
‚ñ´Ô∏èEnglish B1+
 
Qualities we are looking for: 
‚ñ´Ô∏èPride of your work by shipping clean, maintainable, easy to support code by following engineering best practices: testing, documenting, rapid prototyping, modular and structured solutions 
‚ñ´Ô∏èAgile thinking, be able to adopt changes quickly 
‚ñ´Ô∏èAttention to detail and passion to learn and understand technologies you are using 
‚ñ´Ô∏èGood team player 
‚ñ´Ô∏èLove data and data-driven decision-making.


–° —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á—É –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à–∏ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã ‚û°Ô∏è  tg @space_recruiter

#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #—Ä–µ–º–æ—É—Ç #—Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–µ–π—Ç #–í–∞—Ä—à–∞–≤–∞ #job #remote #dataanalyst #data

üöÄ –ü–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è: Data Analyst (mid/ senior level)
üåæ –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: OneSoil
üìç –ì–¥–µ: –í–∞—Ä—à–∞–≤–∞ –∏–ª–∏ —Ä–µ–º–æ—É—Ç –∏–∑ –ª—é–±–æ–π —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏
üë®üèª‚Äçüíª –ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: full-time

üåæ –ö—Ç–æ –º—ã?
–ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–µ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –∏ –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è —Ñ–µ—Ä–º–µ—Ä–æ–≤, –∞–≥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–º–æ–≤ –∏ –∞–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. –ü–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ–º –ø–æ—Å–µ–≤–æ–≤ –¥–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ, —ç–∫–æ–Ω–æ–º–∏—Ç—å —É–¥–æ–±—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Å–µ–º–µ–Ω–∞. –ò, –∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ, –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–∞—Ç—å —É—Ä–æ–∂–∞–π. –í—Å—ë —ç—Ç–æ ‚Äî –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ —Å–ø—É—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–Ω–∏–º–∫–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–æ–≤ –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è.

üëÄ –ß—Ç–æ —Ç—ã –±—É–¥–µ—à—å –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å: 
- –°–µ–≥–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π
- –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å App Features
- –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å User Aquisition 
- –°–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–≤–∞–ª—è—Ç—å user ID –∏–∑ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤
- –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è—Ç—å –≥–∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ–∑—ã –æ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞
- –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å dev –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π –ø–æ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º
- –ö–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∏–±—å—é—Ç–∏—Ç—å –≤ Data Quality
- –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥—ç—à–±–æ—Ä–¥—ã 

üëç –ö–∞–∫ –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç—å, —á—Ç–æ —Ç—ã –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—à—å?
- –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—à—å—Å—è –≤ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–µ
- –ë–æ–∂–µ–Ω—å–∫–∞ SQL
- –ó–Ω–∞–µ—à—å Python, Git
- –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–ª–ª—ã –≤ Data Visualization 
- –£–º–µ–µ—à—å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–æ –¥–æ–Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å –º—ã—Å–ª–∏
- –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª GIS - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–π –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –ø–ª—é—Å üôÇ 

–ë–æ–ª—å—à–µ –ø—Ä–æ –Ω–∞—Å –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞ https://onesoil.ai, –∞ –µ—â–µ –ø–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å, –∫–∞–∫–∏–µ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –Ω–∞ https://blog.onesoil.ai.

text:
A newly founded Health & Fitness company is looking for a Senior Product Analyst in Minsk|Kyiv|Warsaw|Munich. 

Zing Coach is a mobile app that using a unique body and mind methodology, focused on successful long-term fitness. 

Zing is part of Palta family, a venture studio that‚Äôs launched and developed such products as Flo (#1 health & fitness app in the US, the most popular female health app globally, 38M MAY, 180M+ downloads), Prisma (app of the year 2016, 150M downloads), Simple Fasting (#1 fasting app in the US) and many more. Palta is a unique community of founders, investors and world-class experts focused on mobile consumer products.

You'll contribute by:

- Designing and conducting A/B tests on product features and UX design to optimize performance metrics
- Analyzing customer experience and product performance data to extract meaningful insights to make business recommendations (cost-benefit, forecasting, impact analysis, etc)
- Building analytical frameworks, which can include ad-hoc analyses, automated dashboards, and self-service tools
- Designing and maintaining data pipeline for your product domain, ensuring data is delivered in a consistent and reliable manner to stakeholders

We expect that you have:

- Extensive knowledge of SQL and Python data processing skills
- Strong domain knowledge in assessing digital product and their features
- BI tools experience (Amplitude/Looker/etc.)
- Fundamental understanding of statistics (including bayesian statistics)
- Excellent English skills (B2+)

Beneficial skills:

- Experience with SaaS metrics
- Experience building LTV models
- Experience running multiple A/B tests at once

Why working at Zing is awesome:

- Own product
- Be part of the fastest growing fitness and lifestyle startup
- High compensation
- Stock options of the well-funded startup
- Opportunities for rapid career development in a hyper-growth startup
- Excellent work environment: the company is small enough to be person-oriented
- Work-life balance to suit everyone: flexible working hours, loyal sick leave policy
- English speaking environment
- Team meetings in Munich / Kyiv / Warsaw
- Possibility of relocation to Munich / Warsaw

Contact: @mashaber

text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #BI_A–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫ #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #fulltime
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞: 5000$

About
https://www.selina.com/
Selina provides guests with beautiful places to stay, travel, and work abroad indefinitely. 
Plus, we use our in-depth local knowledge to create thousands of authentic activities and experiences in over 60 destinations worldwide.
From the heart of urban cities to the depth of the Amazon Jungle, we put our heart, soul, and wanderlust into providing forever-travelers, break-takers, and staycaters with a new and exciting way to explore the world.

BI Developer will be a key player in Selina‚Äôs technology lead division leading the revolution in hospitality across all of our markets including the US, EU, LATAM and the rest of the world. The BI Developer will be part of establishing and executing a vision for data and analytics platforms and solutions to be used by the business‚Äôs key stakeholders. 

Responsibilities
 ‚ÅÉ Develop and maintain advanced reporting, analytics and dashboards via a leading-edge technological stack including - Looker, Athena, Glue, Amazon Redshift, Redshift Spectrum, Kinesis Firehose, AWS SQS, AWS SNS, Lambda 
 ‚ÅÉ Design and implement the Data Flows and Data Warehousing of the entire Selina‚Äôs business ecosystem
 ‚ÅÉ Collaborate with leaders and stakeholders across Selina in order to develop and deliver end-to-end dashboard and analytics solutions to enable business insights and decisions

 Requirements
 ‚ÅÉ 2+ years‚Äô experience as a BI Developer
 ‚ÅÉ 2+ years programming in Python
 ‚ÅÉ In-depth understanding of database management systems, online analytical processing (OLAP) and ETL (Extract, transform, load) framework
 ‚ÅÉ Extensive experience in DWH Modeling, Dashboarding and Reporting with one of the industry leading BI tool stacks
 ‚ÅÉ Tableau experience is a good advantage
 ‚ÅÉ Previous experience with AWS stack - advantage 
 ‚ÅÉ Experience in orchestration with Jenkins or Airflow - advantage
 ‚ÅÉ English verbal and written communication skills

–ü–æ –≤—Å–µ–º –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º –ø–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ @marderfeld

–ü–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è: BI A–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫
–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: –ò–∑—Ä–∞–∏–ª—å
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞

–ó–ü: 5000$

Company
https://www.selina.com/
Selina provides guests with beautiful places to stay, travel, and work abroad indefinitely. 
Plus, we use our in-depth local knowledge to create thousands of authentic activities and experiences in over 60 destinations worldwide.
From the heart of urban cities to the depth of the Amazon Jungle, we put our heart, soul, and wanderlust into providing forever-travelers, break-takers, and staycaters with a new and exciting way to explore the world.

The BI Developer will be a key player in Selina‚Äôs technology lead division leading the revolution in hospitality across all of our markets including the US, EU, LATAM and the rest of the world. 
The BI Developer will be part of establishing and executing a vision for data and analytics platforms and solutions to be used by the business‚Äôs key stakeholders. 

Experience & Qualifications:
 ‚ÅÉ 2+ years‚Äô experience as a BI Developer
 ‚ÅÉ 2+ years programming in Python
 ‚ÅÉ In-depth understanding of database management systems, online analytical processing (OLAP) and ETL (Extract, transform, load) framework
 ‚ÅÉ Extensive experience in DWH Modeling, Dashboarding and Reporting with one of the industry leading BI tool stacks
 ‚ÅÉ Tableau experience is a good advantage
 ‚ÅÉ Previous experience with AWS stack - advantage 
 ‚ÅÉ Experience in orchestration with Jenkins or Airflow - advantage
 ‚ÅÉ English verbal and written communication skills

Responsibilities
 ‚ÅÉ Develop and maintain advanced reporting, analytics and dashboards via a leading-edge technological stack including - Looker, Athena, Glue, Amazon Redshift, Redshift Spectrum, Kinesis Firehose, AWS SQS, AWS SNS, Lambda 
 ‚ÅÉ Design and implement the Data Flows and Data Warehousing of the entire Selina‚Äôs business ecosystem
 ‚ÅÉ Collaborate with leaders and stakeholders across Selina in order to develop and deliver end-to-end dashboard and analytics solutions to enable business insights and decisions

 ‚ÅÉ –°–∫–∏–¥–∫–∞ 30% –Ω–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å Selina –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—Å –∏ 25% –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö –¥—Ä—É–∑–µ–π –∏ —Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö

text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #Luxoft #dataengineer
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞, –∏–ª–∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞
–ó/–ø: 250 000 ‚Äì 350 000 —Ä—É–±. –≥—Ä–æ—Å—Å

–ù–∞—à–∞ agile-–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ—Ç –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É GMTA (Global Markets Trading Analytics) –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–∞—Ö –î–µ–ø–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –ì–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –†—ã–Ω–∫–æ–≤ (–î–ì–†).
–î–ì–† - –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º –∏ —Ä–æ–∑–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã–º –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–π —Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç—Ä –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ —É—Å–ª—É–≥ –Ω–∞ –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –∑–∞—Ä—É–±–µ–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞—Ö. –ö–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞ - Fx trading, Commodities, Equity, Founding, Fixed Income, Rates, Credit Valuation Adjustment, Structured Products, Investment Banking.
–¢–µ–∫—É—â–∏–π –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã:
‚Ä¢ Python, Java
‚Ä¢ Informatica PowerCenter
‚Ä¢ Kafka, AirFlow
‚Ä¢ InfluxDB, kdb+, OneTick
‚Ä¢ MS SQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
‚Ä¢ Grafana, Qlik Sense, Kibana, ELK
‚Ä¢ OpenShift
‚Ä¢ Python ML/DL libraries, PySpark, TensorFlow

–û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:
‚Ä¢ –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤.
‚Ä¢ –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.
‚Ä¢ –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–Ω –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.
‚Ä¢ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–ø—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏

–¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:
–ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–∞ –≤ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π —Ñ–∞–∑–µ - —Ç–æ, —á—Ç–æ –µ–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤ —Ç–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞ –ø–æ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è–º:
‚Ä¢ DevOps
‚Ä¢ –ü—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã —Å–±–æ—Ä–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (–ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤): ETL / ELT, –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —à–∏–Ω—ã, –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä—ã, Streaming –∏ Batch —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º—ã –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
‚Ä¢ –°–£–ë–î –∏ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
‚Ä¢ –ö–æ–¥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ: –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∏–ª–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∫–∏ –≤ Windows –∏ Unix-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ö
‚Ä¢ SQL

–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è: 
‚Ä¢ –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ
‚Ä¢ –†–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç
‚Ä¢ –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ
‚Ä¢ –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏
‚Ä¢ –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã
‚Ä¢ –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã
‚Ä¢ –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è—Ö, –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø–∞—Ö –∏ –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Å—Ç–∞—Ö
‚Ä¢ –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è

–ü–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã:
–Ω–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç–µ  –∏–ª–∏ –≤ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–≥—Ä–∞–º–µ @dvarshukova

–ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–µ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –∏ –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è —Ñ–µ—Ä–º–µ—Ä–æ–≤, –∞–≥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–º–æ–≤ –∏ –∞–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. –ü–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ–º —Å–ª–µ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ–º –ø–æ—Å–µ–≤–æ–≤ –¥–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ, —ç–∫–æ–Ω–æ–º–∏—Ç—å —É–¥–æ–±—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Å–µ–º–µ–Ω–∞. –ò, –∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ, –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–∞—Ç—å —É—Ä–æ–∂–∞–π. –í—Å—ë —ç—Ç–æ ‚Äî –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ —Å–ø—É—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–Ω–∏–º–∫–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–æ–≤ –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è.
